item.description:
Event Description: This is a different type of event. After RSVP-ing to the meetup online, contact a coordinator for your region.

Each region needs 20+ people.

We will partner up to distribute pro-life literature to church-goers at the end of their service, as they drive out of the parking lot. This has been done successfully by other groups.

WE WILL NOT WEAR Ron Paul gear and WILL NOT HOLD Ron Paul signs.

This is quick and easy work. You will be at each location for less than 15 minutes most likely. Each team will be assigned 2-3 church services. The coordinators have the church list and will be getting details on timing over the next couple of days.

If you can work Saturday evening, let your coordinator know.

They will try to match people up with churches near their homes. If you already have a partner, let them know. If you need to be matched up with someone they will do that.

PLEASE help with this! This is crucial.


Coordinators:
Seacoast: Liz - liz (at) keyelementdesign.com
Manchester/Concord: Mike Malloy - 215-913-1183
North Country: Harry Harrison - 603-703-7785
Keene Area: Doug Bershaw - 239-8827
Concord Area: Lisa Blake - 414-839-4060

If you don't get a response from your coordinator, please contact Mike Failla at (603) 724-0320
item.name: Pro-life outreach
